hero.heading: Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: I build pixel perferct, responsive, user-friendly, high-performance website that is accessible to all, helping individuals and businesses achieve their goals.

values.heading: Responsive
values.body: I build websites that can adapt to any screen size, either a mobile device, tablet device or a desktop device. Presenting the website in best possible way

values.heading: Pixel Perfect
values.body: When collaborating with designers I'm presented with a design to bring to life with resources like colors, typography, icons at my disposal. When building the designn I recreate it just as the design is

values.heading: Accessible
values.body: I create websites that is attractive to the users by using the rightm colors, typography, icons that represents the vision of the individual or business
